grounding:
This conversation with Sir Partha Dasgupta, moderated by Annual Review of Economics Editorial Commitee Member Tim Besley, focuses on biodiversity and its implications for economic thought and policy. A video of this interview is available online at 
https://www.annualreviews.org/r/partha_dasgupta_interview
.
generated_text: This conversation with Sir Partha Dasgupta explores the intersection of biodiversity, economic growth, and development. It highlights the role of inclusive wealth and asset management in integrating biodiversity into economic theory, emphasizing sustainable practices for future prosperity.
